title: error d3d9 dll
body:
Greetings, 
Today I wanted to play LOL on my new computer, I logged in, and I start up a ranked game.I choose my champion and may layout as usual but when the game has to run it just gets me with an error d3d9 dll and idk how to solve this. I got 20 minutes leaverbuster, I might have left some matches before but the point is that the punishment I just had was because of an error on direct X. But when I try to install direct X the program says that the components are ready to be used.

Someone help me please.

replies.body: Sorry this impacted your game. :(  There could be a few issues here, likely with the driver or the permissions to access it.  If you have an antivirus, there's a good chance it's blocking game files from being accessed.  Should that be the case double check your antivirus and remove blocks, making sure sure to allow the entire Riot Games folder as an exception.
